mapper.insert: insert into conference(user_id, create_time, name, detail, address, start_time, end_time, enroll_time, invite_code, hotel_id, fleet_id, progress) values(#{userId}, #{createTime}, #{name}, #{detail}, #{address}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{enrollTime}, #{inviteCode}, #{hotelId}, #{fleetId}, #{progress})
mapper.select: select * from conference where progress<>'ENDED' and id in(select conference_id from enrollment where user_id=#{userId})
select * from conference where progress='ENDED' and id in (select conference_id from enrollment where user_id=#{userId})
select * from conference where id=#{id} and exists (select * from enrollment where conference_id=conference.id and user_id=#{userId})
select * from conference where `number`=#{number} and exists (select * from enrollment where conference_id=conference.id and user_id=#{userId})
